https://tmrev.io/movie/181894-An Easter Bunny Puppy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oF3EYsQK7kbzS0Zf5HV4DNugioJ.jpg A Mystery writer is not thrilled when she's assigned to write a children's book, "An Easter Bunny Puppy." Out of ideas, she asks her daughter for help. Meanwhile, her dog, RUSS, the narrator of the story, digs up a priceless Faberge egg buried in the woods and takes it home with him, unaware that he's trailing a thief who stole the egg. An Easter Bunny Puppy
